text: @PreetBharara My current "worst case conspiracy theory" is that Trump is going to allow the COVID-19 issue to worsen progressively, intentionally, so that there is such a national emergency come Oct/Nov that we have to "suspend the election" b/c going out to vote would be a public health risk.
